languages.text: "Молись Ему, уничтожай Его врагов и не касайся их отравленных даров. Не сомневайся и будь бдител{mf|ен|ьна} к слабым душам подле себя. Увидев скверну — выжигай ее без жалости. Боль хороша, она срывает с души корку мерзости. И помни, что, если ты не видишь греха в себе и подле себя — значит, ты недостаточно упорствуешь в поиске его. Или слишком жалеешь себя, пряча взгляд от правды".

traits.locale_text: "Молись Ему, уничтожай Его врагов и не касайся их отравленных даров. Не сомневайся и будь бдител{mf|ен|ьна} к слабым душам подле себя. Увидев скверну — выжигай ее без жалости. Боль хороша, она срывает с души корку мерзости. И помни, что, если ты не видишь греха в себе и подле себя — значит, ты недостаточно упорствуешь в поиске его. Или слишком жалеешь себя, пряча взгляд от правды".

languages.text: "Pray to Him, destroy His enemies, and touch not their poisoned gifts. Cast aside all doubt and be vigilant against the weak souls beside you. When you see a sign of taint — burn it away without pity. Pain is good, it tears the crust of vileness from one's soul. And remember that if you see no fault in you or around you, then you are not being diligent enough in your search. Or you are being too lenient on yourself, averting your eyes from the truth."
languages.original_text: "Молись Ему, уничтожай Его врагов и не касайся их отравленных даров. Не сомневайся и будь бдител{mf|ен|ьна} к слабым душам подле себя. Увидев скверну — выжигай ее без жалости. Боль хороша, она срывает с души корку мерзости. И помни, что, если ты не видишь греха в себе и подле себя — значит, ты недостаточно упорствуешь в поиске его. Или слишком жалеешь себя, пряча взгляд от правды".

traits.locale_text: "Pray to Him, destroy His enemies, and touch not their poisoned gifts. Cast aside all doubt and be vigilant against the weak souls beside you. Once you see a sign of taint — burn it away without pity. Pain is good, it tears the crust of vileness off one's soul. And remember that if you see no sin in you or around you, then you are not diligent enough in your search. Or you are too lenient on yourself as you avert your eyes from the truth."

"Pray to Him, destroy His enemies, and touch not their poisoned gifts. Cast aside all doubt and be vigilant against the weak souls beside you. Once you see a sign of taint — burn it away without pity. Pain is good, it tears the crust of vileness off one's soul. And remember that if you see no sin in you or around you, then you are not diligent enough in your search. Or you are too lenient on yourself as you avert your eyes from the truth."

When you see a sign of taint — burn it away without pity. Pain is good, it tears the crust of vileness from one's soul. And remember that if you see no fault in you or around you, then you are not being diligent enough in your search. Or you are being too lenient on yourself, averting your eyes from the truth."

languages.text: “向祂祈祷。消灭祂的敌人，不要接触他们的毒药。抛开一切怀疑，对身边软弱的灵魂保持警惕。当你看到污点的迹象时，要毫不怜悯地烧掉它。痛苦是善行，因为它可以净化灵魂中的邪恶。请记住，如果你并没有在你自己身上，或是在你周围看到任何罪行，那么你的探询还不够勤奋，也可能是你对自己过于宽容，不肯认清真相。”
languages.original_text: "Pray to Him, destroy His enemies, and touch not their poisoned gifts. Cast aside all doubt and be vigilant against the weak souls beside you. When you see a sign of taint — burn it away without pity. Pain is good, it tears the crust of vileness from one's soul. And remember that if you see no fault in you or around you, then you are not being diligent enough in your search. Or you are being too lenient on yourself, averting your eyes from the truth."

traits.locale_text: “向祂祈祷。消灭祂的敌人，不要接触他们的毒药。抛开一切怀疑，对身边软弱的灵魂保持警惕。当你看到污点的迹象时，要毫不怜悯地烧掉它。痛苦是善行，因为它可以净化灵魂中的邪恶。请记住，如果你并没有在你自己身上，或是在你周围看到任何罪行，那么你的探询还不够勤奋，也可能是你对自己过于宽容，不肯认清真相。”

languages.text: «Rece, destruya a los enemigos del Emperador y no toque sus regalos envenenados. Deje las dudas a un lado y vigile a las almas débiles a sus espaldas. Cuando vea algún indicio de corrupción, quémelo sin piedad. El dolor es positivo, pues rompe la capa de maldad que se aferra al alma. Y recuerde que, si no ve la falta en su interior ni a su alrededor, significa que su búsqueda no es lo suficientemente exhaustiva o que está siendo demasiado permisiv{mf|o|a} y apartando los ojos de la verdad».
languages.original_text: "Pray to Him, destroy His enemies, and touch not their poisoned gifts. Cast aside all doubt and be vigilant against the weak souls beside you. When you see a sign of taint — burn it away without pity. Pain is good, it tears the crust of vileness from one's soul. And remember that if you see no fault in you or around you, then you are not being diligent enough in your search. Or you are being too lenient on yourself, averting your eyes from the truth."

traits.locale_text: «Rece, destruya a Sus enemigos y no toque sus regalos envenenados. Deje las dudas a un lado y vigile a las almas débiles a sus espaldas. Cuando vea algún indicio de corrupción, quémelo sin piedad. El dolor es positivo, pues rompe la capa de maldad que se aferra al alma. Y recuerde que, si no ve el pecado en su interior ni a su alrededor, significa que su búsqueda no es lo suficientemente exhaustiva o que está siendo demasiado permisiv{mf|o|a} y apartando los ojos de la verdad».

languages.text: 「主に祈り、その敵を打ち破り、毒が塗られた敵の贈り物に触れないように振舞えばよいでしょう。あらゆる疑念を捨て去り、傍らにいる弱い魂に警戒しなさい。穢れの兆候を見つけたら、哀れみを見せずに焼き払いなさい。痛みは善であり、魂から邪悪の外被を引きはがします。そして、もしご自身やその周りに過ちが存在しないとお思いなら、それは信仰的探求が足りないことを意味します。あるいは、自分に甘く、真実から目をそらしているのです」
languages.original_text: "Pray to Him, destroy His enemies, and touch not their poisoned gifts. Cast aside all doubt and be vigilant against the weak souls beside you. When you see a sign of taint — burn it away without pity. Pain is good, it tears the crust of vileness from one's soul. And remember that if you see no fault in you or around you, then you are not being diligent enough in your search. Or you are being too lenient on yourself, averting your eyes from the truth."

traits.locale_text: 「主に祈り、その敵を打ち破り、毒が塗られた敵の贈り物に触れないように振舞えばよいでしょう。あらゆる疑念を捨て去り、傍らにいる弱い魂に警戒しなさい。穢れの兆候を見つけたら、哀れみを見せずに焼き払いなさい。痛みは善であり、魂から邪悪の外被を引きはがします。そして、もしご自身やその周りに過ちが存在しないとお思いなら、それは信仰的探求が足りないことを意味します。あるいは、自分に甘く、真実から目をそらしているのです」

languages.text: "Betet zu ihm, vernichtet seine Feinde und berührt nicht deren vergiftete Geschenke. Legt alle Zweifel ab und hütet Euch vor den schwachen Seelen an Eurer Seite. Wenn Ihr ein Zeichen des Makels bemerkt – brennt es ohne Gnade aus. Schmerz ist gut, denn er reißt die Kruste der Schändlichkeit von Eurer Seele. Und vergisst nicht: Wenn Ihr in Euch oder um Euch herum keine Fehler wahrnehmt, seht Ihr lediglich nicht genau genug hin. Oder Ihr seid zu nachsichtig mit Euch selbst und verschließt Eure Augen vor der Wahrheit."
languages.original_text: "Pray to Him, destroy His enemies, and touch not their poisoned gifts. Cast aside all doubt and be vigilant against the weak souls beside you. When you see a sign of taint — burn it away without pity. Pain is good, it tears the crust of vileness from one's soul. And remember that if you see no fault in you or around you, then you are not being diligent enough in your search. Or you are being too lenient on yourself, averting your eyes from the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Betet zu ihm, vernichtet seine Feinde und berührt nicht deren vergiftete Geschenke. Legt alle Zweifel ab und hütet Euch vor den schwachen Seelen an Eurer Seite. Wenn Ihr ein Zeichen des Makels bemerkt – brennt es ohne Gnade aus. Schmerz ist gut, denn er reißt die Kruste der Schändlichkeit von Eurer Seele. Und vergisst nicht: Wenn Ihr in Euch oder um Euch herum keine Sünde wahrnehmt, seht Ihr lediglich nicht genau genug hin. Oder Ihr seid zu nachsichtig mit Euch selbst und verschließt Eure Augen vor der Wahrheit."

languages.text: « Adressez-Lui vos prières, détruisez Ses ennemis, et retenez-vous de toucher leurs cadeaux empoisonnés. Mettez vos doutes de côté et méfiez-vous des âmes faibles qui vous entourent. Si vous apercevez un signe de corruption, brûlez-le sans la moindre pitié. La souffrance est une bonne chose, elle permet de craqueler l'ignominie de l'âme. Et rappelez-vous : si vous ne remarquez aucuns errements en vous ou autour de vous, c'est que vous n'ouvrez pas suffisamment les yeux, ou que vous faites preuve d'une trop grande indulgence envers vous-même en refusant de voir la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "Pray to Him, destroy His enemies, and touch not their poisoned gifts. Cast aside all doubt and be vigilant against the weak souls beside you. When you see a sign of taint — burn it away without pity. Pain is good, it tears the crust of vileness from one's soul. And remember that if you see no fault in you or around you, then you are not being diligent enough in your search. Or you are being too lenient on yourself, averting your eyes from the truth."

traits.locale_text: « Adressez-Lui vos prières, détruisez Ses ennemis, et retenez-vous de toucher leurs cadeaux empoisonnés. Mettez vos doutes de côté et méfiez-vous des âmes faibles qui vous entourent. Si vous apercevez un signe de corruption, brûlez-le sans la moindre pitié. La souffrance est une bonne chose, elle permet de craqueler l'ignominie de l'âme. Et rappelez-vous : si vous ne remarquez aucun péché en vous ou autour de vous, c'est que vous n'ouvrez pas suffisamment les yeux, ou que vous faites preuve d'une trop grande indulgence envers vous-même en refusant de voir la vérité. »

languages.text: "O'na dua et, O'nun düşmanlarını yok et ve kâfirlerin zehirli armağanlarına elini sürme. Şüphene yüz çevir ve çevrendeki zayıf ruhlara karşı her daim uyanık ol. Kirlenmeye dair bir işaret gördüğünde de gözünü bile kırpmadan yak. Acı iyidir, kişinin ruhundaki kötülük tortularını temizler. Ayrıca unutma ki kendi içinde veya çevrende kusur göremiyorsan yeterince dikkatli bakmıyorsun demektir. Ya da belki kendine karşı fazla hoşgörülüsündür, gözlerini gerçeklerden kaçırıyorsundur."
languages.original_text: "Pray to Him, destroy His enemies, and touch not their poisoned gifts. Cast aside all doubt and be vigilant against the weak souls beside you. When you see a sign of taint — burn it away without pity. Pain is good, it tears the crust of vileness from one's soul. And remember that if you see no fault in you or around you, then you are not being diligent enough in your search. Or you are being too lenient on yourself, averting your eyes from the truth."

traits.locale_text: "O'na dua et, O'nun düşmanlarını yok et ve onların zehirli armağanlarına elini sürme. Tüm şüpheyi bir kenara bırak ve çevrendeki zayıf ruhlara karşı her daim uyanık ol. Kirliliğe dair bir işaret gördüğün zaman onu acımadan yak. Acı iyidir, kişinin ruhundaki kötülük tortularını temizler. Eğer ki kendi içinde veya çevrende herhangi bir sorun göremiyorsan, yeterince dikkatli bakmıyorsun demektir. Ya da kendine karşı fazla hoşgörülüsündür, gözlerini gerçeklerden kaçırıyorsundur."
